title: SpringDAO Ecosystem Grants Season 1
body:
🌊 Calling all Springers, Spring...... "      "

Here is a link to learn more about SpringDAO:

Here is a link how to vote:

Here is a link to how proposals were made:

Why are we doing this text:

Season 1 batch total Amount:
$20,000 USD

📸 This snapshot poll will help to allocate the grants. 
- Each Nominee has a link to their proposal page:
[Reddit/Discourse/Gitcoin] 

Alice:
Bob:
Clair:
Earl:
Fred:

(The proposal deadline was 11/7/2020 at midnight, as communicated. There will be future grant programs)

[Reward Criteria]
<Option A>
-Equal Weight

<Option B>
-Weight + Threshold:
For each grant that passes the voting threshold, our mods will contact the recipient and ask how they'd like to receive it, whether directly, or through gitcoin.

Snapshot vote is binding. Each recipient with more than 1% of the Spring supply voted will receive a grant.

Not all the nominees could get a grant, and there's no way to know how the vote will go, and the vote is not in any way a reflection of your impact in the ecosystem. SPRING holders will vote based on their individual preferences, so for the nominees, we appreciate your understanding in advance.


//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

Votes are live. Polls are open until 11pm UTC November 10, 2020

[As per how snapshot works, only SPRNG holders before ETH block 11229672 will be able to vote]
author: 0x6268FF2E44Cc1EcC6ACf465fe42754A9F798B1f5
